bibl.title: All the World's a Page: Imitation of Metatheater in Theocritus 15, Herodas 1 and Virgil Eclogues 3. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: I. Mimesis and Artifice. - II. Dramatic and Quasi-Dramatic Participation. - III. Indirect Audience Address in Theocritus and Herodas. - IV. The Development of a Quasi-Dramatic Technique: Ecl. 3.84-85.
KUTZKO David, All the World's a Page: Imitation of Metatheater in Theocritus 15, Herodas 1 and Virgil Eclogues 3. Avec résumé en anglais.
